title: IHC serves notices to respondents on Bushra Bibiâ€™s plea
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 24 (APP):The Islamabad High Court (IHC) on Wednesday issued notices to respondents on a petition seeking provision of cases details against Bushra and not to arrest him in any new case.
Chief Justice Aamer Farooq heard the request of Bushra Bibi regarding the aforesaid matter.
The court directed for providing the details of the cases till the next hearing.
The hearing of the case was adjourned till next week by issuing notices to the parties.
